act:
Canada Infrastructure Bank Act
Financial Administration Act
subject: Appointment of the joint auditors of the Canada Infrastructure Bank
precis: Order appointing BDO Canada LLP of Toronto, Ontario, and the Auditor General of Canada as joint auditors of the Canada Infrastructure Bank for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2026.
